entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Sunday 19 March 2023
